name: Bernice Pauahi Bishop Museum
text: §6E-40  Bernice Pauahi Bishop Museum.  The official designation of the Bernice Pauahi Bishop Museum shall be the State of Hawaii Museum of Natural and Cultural History.  The qualifying standards and conditions related to the receipt of funds contained in chapter 42F shall not apply to funds received by the State of Hawaii Museum of Natural and Cultural History; provided that if the museum in turn contracts with a recipient or provider, then the qualifying standards, conditions, and other provisions of chapter 42F shall apply to the recipient or provider and the contract. [L 1988, c 398, §4; am L 1991, c 335, §3; am L 1997, c 190, §6]
